content.question: If <math alttext="f prime of x, equals, x squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></math> and <math alttext="g prime of x, equals, 3 times e to the x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></math> and if <math alttext="h of x, equals, f of x, times, g of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>h</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></math>, then <math alttext="h prime of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math> could be

choices.label: <math alttext="3 times x squared, times e to the x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="x cubed, times e to the x power, plus, 3 times x squared, times e to the x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="x cubed, times e to the x power, plus x squared, times e to the x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="3 times x squared, times e to the x power, plus 6 x times e to the x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="x cubed, times e to the x power, plus, 3 times x squared, times e to the x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
